CHAT.comment: JERRY N. JONES, ET AL., Petitioners v. HARRIS ASSOCIATES L.P.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:04 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DAVID C. FREDERICK ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF CURTIS E. GANNON ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JOHN D. DONOVAN, JR. ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF DAVID C. FREDERICK ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 10:57 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
